meaningMnemonic: See all those <radical>icicle</radical>s to the <radical>dog</radical>'s left? Good thing they all fell on his left, or he would've been in a terrible <kanji>condition</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: What saved the dog's <kanji>condition</kanji> was none other than <reading>Joe</reading> (じょう), the local farmhand. He constantly keeps an eye on the dog's condition, including any dangerously sharp icicles that could descend on him.
